entry.content: ğŸŒ¿âœ¨ A huge THANK YOU to everyone who made the Ballyhoura Walking Festival 2023 a tremendous success! âœ¨ğŸŒ¿ Over 350 walkers joined us for an incredible weekend of adventure, and we couldnâ€™t have done it without your enthusiasm. A massive shoutout goes to our dedicated volunteers who played an indispensable role in making this festival a success. A special mention goes to the incredible members of the Ballyhoura Bears Walking Club for their invaluable assistance in planning and leading the walks. A huge thanks to our ambulance crew from the Red Cross, who tirelessly drove around and ensured our safety throughout the festival. Weâ€™re also grateful for the unwavering support from the Kilfinane community, Joyce Brothers Music Festival Committee, Kilfinane Community Council, Ballyhoura CCE, Ballyhoura Heritage & Environment and Ballyhoura FÃ¡ilte volunteer members. A heartfelt thank you to Limerick County Council for their festival funding, which made this festival even more enjoyable for all. Weâ€™d also like to express our appreciation to Deebert House Hotel for providing refreshments and Centra in Kilfinane for supplying us with healthy goodies for our goodie bags. A special tip of the hat to our local guides who led our heritage walks in Kilmallock, Lough Gur, Mitchelstown, and Doneraile, including members of the Doneraile Drama Society. Your captivating stories added a whole new layer to our walks! There are too many more people to mention, but we do appreciate all your help and support. Weâ€™re already looking forward to next yearâ€™s adventures! ğŸŒ„ğŸ¥¾ #BallyhouraWalkingFestival #ThankYou #Community #Adventure #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraFestival

entry.title: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders cre
entry.content: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders crew @ballyhouratrailriders 3. A bike shop with all the essentials, like bike gear, spare tubes, snacks and coffee 4. Toilets 5. A bike wash (â‚¬2 required) 6. Showers (2 x â‚¬1 coins required) 7. Picnic tables for post-ride munchies And a fantastic community atmosphere, especially on weekends. With over 98km of mountain biking trails, including recent exciting new additions to the network, don't miss the chance to ride here. @Munster Vales @Irelandâ€™s Hidden Heartlands @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie @Tourism Ireland #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Irelandtravel #ballyhouraforest #coillteoutdoors #mountainbiking #mtb #mtblife #mtblovers

entry.title: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed?
entry.content: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km).
